68 typedef enum {
70  ADI_TMR_SUCCESS,
72  ADI_TMR_BAD_DEVICE_NUM,
74  ADI_TMR_BAD_PWM_NUM,
76  ADI_TMR_BAD_EVENT_ID,
78  ADI_TMR_BAD_RELOAD_CONFIGURATION,
80  ADI_TMR_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED,
82  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_BUSY,
84  ADI_TMR_RELOAD_DISABLED,
86  ADI_TMR_NULL_POINTER
87 } ADI_TMR_RESULT;

94 typedef enum {
96  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_GP0 = 0u,
98  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_GP1 = 1u,
100  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_GP2 = 2u,
101 #if defined(__ADUCM302x__)
102 
103  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_NUM = 3u,
104 #elif defined(__ADUCM4x50__)
105 
106  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_RGB = 3u,
108  ADI_TMR_DEVICE_NUM = 4u,
109 #else
110 #error TMR is not ported for this processor
111 #endif
112 } ADI_TMR_DEVICE;
113 
119 typedef enum {
121  ADI_TMR_EVENT_TIMEOUT = 0x01,
123  ADI_TMR_EVENT_CAPTURE = 0x02,
124 } ADI_TMR_EVENT;
125 
131 typedef enum {
133  ADI_TMR_PRESCALER_1 = 0u,
135  ADI_TMR_PRESCALER_16 = 1u,
137  ADI_TMR_PRESCALER_64 = 2u,
139  ADI_TMR_PRESCALER_256 = 3u,
140 } ADI_TMR_PRESCALER;
141 
147 typedef enum {
149  ADI_TMR_CLOCK_PCLK = 0u,
151  ADI_TMR_CLOCK_HFOSC = 1u,
153  ADI_TMR_CLOCK_LFOSC = 2u,
155  ADI_TMR_CLOCK_LFXTAL = 3u,
156 } ADI_TMR_CLOCK_SOURCE;
157 
165 typedef enum {
167  ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT_0 = 0u,
169  ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT_1 = 1u,
171  ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT_2 = 2u,
173  ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT_NUM = 3u,
174 } ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT;
175 
182 typedef struct {
184  bool bCountingUp;
186  bool bPeriodic;
188  ADI_TMR_PRESCALER ePrescaler;
190  ADI_TMR_CLOCK_SOURCE eClockSource;
192  uint16_t nLoad;
194  uint16_t nAsyncLoad;
196  bool bReloading;
198  bool bSyncBypass;
199 } ADI_TMR_CONFIG;
200 
207 typedef struct {
209  bool bEnable;
211  bool bPrescaleReset;
213  uint8_t nEventID;
214 } ADI_TMR_EVENT_CONFIG;
215 
222 typedef struct {
224  ADI_TMR_PWM_OUTPUT eOutput;
226  bool bMatch;
228  bool bIdleHigh;
230  uint16_t nMatchValue;
231 } ADI_TMR_PWM_CONFIG;
232 
233 /******************************************************************************
234  * PUBLIC API
235  * 1.) Eliminate functions that may be optimized out by the linker
236  * 2.) Ordered by designed function call sequence
237  *****************************************************************************/
238 
239 /* Initialize timer driver */
240 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_Init (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, ADI_CALLBACK const pfCallback, void * const pCBParam, bool bEnableInt);
241 
242 /* Configuration interface functions */
243 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_ConfigTimer (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, ADI_TMR_CONFIG timerConfig);
244 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_ConfigEvent (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, ADI_TMR_EVENT_CONFIG eventConfig);
245 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_ConfigPwm (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, ADI_TMR_PWM_CONFIG pwmConfig );
246 
247 /* Timer start and stop */
248 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_Enable (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, bool bEnable);
249 
250 /* Read functions */
251 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_GetCurrentCount (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, uint16_t *pCount);
252 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_GetCaptureCount (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice, uint16_t *pCount);
253 
254 /* Reload function */
255 ADI_TMR_RESULT adi_tmr_Reload (ADI_TMR_DEVICE const eDevice);
